page.title: 09FLORA AND FAUNA continued
page.content: The fruits grow in bunches and look like twisted wings. Ash wood is very good for lighting fires. {Alder}leaves are green and are quite flat. Their buds are greenish brown.Around Autumn little black cones form on the branches. {Hawthown }leaves are deep green and are shiny and are deeply lobed.The branches are covered in sharp pointed thorns.Hawthorn flowers are small and white with red stamens.Red berries grow on the branches in Winter time. {Elderberry}has large green leaves which are covered in small fine hairs.The fruit are black and grow in bunches. {Holly}leaves never grow in pairs.The leaves are dark green and shiny.It is an evergreen and grows in Winter.The Holly bears red berries which the birds feed upon in Winter.
